Safeguard Information on iPhone & iPad

22 Feb 2013

You do have Find My iPhone don’t you? Yes. Here’s how to protect it.

  • Select Settings
  • Select General
  • Select Restrictions
  • Select Enable Restrictions and enter a password
  • Find Deleting Apps and toggle this to OFF (this stops anyone deleting the Find My iPhone app)
  • Scroll to the Privacy section
  • Select Locations Services
  • Select Don’t Allow Changes
  • Go back to Restrictions
  • Select Accounts
  • Select Don’t Allow Changes

Don’t tell your Service Provider the iPhone or iPad is stolen until after you have talked to the Police! Hopefully you’ll never be in this awful situation.
